text:
StyleSeat | Sr. Software Engineers | San Francisco, CA

StyleSeat has experienced massive organic growth and booked more than $1B dollars of appointments in 2015, (up from ~$400M in 2014, ~$100M in 2013), with 350k service providers and 7 million consumers.

Sr. Front End - JS/HTML/CSS/Angular/Sass

Sr. Growth - FS Python/Django/JS/Angular

Sr. Infrastructure - AWS/Docker

Lead Search and Discovery - Python/Django/Elasticsearch

http://static.styleseat.com/jobs/index.html
